title: "Ey up, Alexa! Amazon to add British regional words to voice assistant's vocabulary"
excerpt: "But now, the language experts who develop the AI technology for Amazon's voice assistant hope to change that by adding hundreds of regional words to its vocabulary. The move should help Alexa understand that someone asking about a cheeselog in a moggie cake is someone facing the dilemma of a woodlouse in their bread roll."
